values:
yea i havent posted on this in a loooong time. weird. i forgot about it. but today i found my goddess. Brigid. Goddess of fire. Fire of inspiration and smithcrafts. im going to search about her more. if ne one knows anything about her please do tell. hmm i want messages people! message me!!!!!! heh k im done. oh yea, 

In loveing memorie of Caeildeah, my cat. 

?-?-91 to December 1 2000

sometimes letting things go, is the best thing to do.

we put her to sleep yesterday, she died of feline lukemia(sp?) she will be missed, always inmy thoughts

I just asked my Witchhaven mailing list for some advice for my friends. They are having alot of problems in school with making friends and things like that. And I just feel so helpless cuz I dont goto school with any of them.

So maybe I can get a spell or something to help them out.

Wow, I was so scared of school. And its turning out great. I just started a new school. i made 4 friends by teh second day (Crystal, Christopher, Angel and Sara. PLUS, Sara asked me out, but she talked to her ex-boyfriend and she is in a pickle, but I want her to do whatever makes her happy, woah she is a hottie. lol. 

I have so much mail from all the pagan mailing lists, I dont really have time to check it, but I'll work on it!:) well its 4:45 am, and I need to finsish getting ready for school! byebye

Well, scholl starts tommoarw, and I am very very scared. Im going to burn a candle for myself:) hehe. This Damned paranoia isn't going to help much,plus its a new school. oh well.

Someone is acctualy reading my journal... HI OUT THERE!!! lol im being silly today.I need to clean my room to get a alter up. I cant wait till Halloween. Its going to be fun. My friends, who are also new at paganism/wicca/witchcraft and I are going to work with a Ouija board, but we are going to be very careful. 

No sleep for me tonight, too nervious about school starting. wow... only 2 years left. Im a Jr.. wow. lol. ok byebye

Well, no more phucked up dreams, well last night I didnt sleep so that doesnt count, but the night before does. My pager is broken so I am going to take it back today, along with getting some new pants... hopefully. Micheal(my ex) is threatening to kill himself cuz I don't want to be his friend. So I got a spell to get rid of him, no not like death, lol, like for him to forget about me. My hair is purple now. Last night I sent energies to Bill, and it was kewl, later wheni talk to him he was doing better. Maybe it worked:)
I hope so.

LESSON #1...
***DO NOT PLAY WITH CANDLES!***

I burnt myself with Candle wax last night. ick.. was not fun.

Hmm. I met some nice ladys on the Witchhaven mailing list. They have dicided I am a changeling. This almost makes sence. Last night while I was sleeping (after they told me) I had a weird dream. Things were flying through my head, memories, animals, objects, places, and I heard a voice saying stuff, but I couldnt make out what it was saying. It was very strange. Im going to have to go to the library to find out more about Changelings

Well, I didnt make it to the library, grrr, it was closed till Sept 5. Im going to go to one of the other librarys. I got alot of other info off the web, at someone off of the witchaven mailing lists sites. it was great info, my only problem was it wasnt fully working so i am guna go back and see if I can access the rest of the pages. I have started typeing up alot of info instead of writting it down, it will make it easyer on me, so if I run out of space in my Book of Shadows I wont have to start a new book, I can just keep printing out what I have typed up and put it all in a binder. I also e-mailed some people in my area who are wiccan and pagan and hopefuly they will write back and we can talk about stuff. Maybe they know of some stored that sell good stuff. I only know of Womans Wish.

Today im hopefuling going to go to the library and check out some books on paganism and witchcraft. The lady I met lastnight online gave me a few good books to look for. She also sent me to a mailing list site, its looks good so far. I didnt sleep last night, I duno why, I think I'll go take a 2 hour nap maybe, I duno. oh well. 

Books sugested...
SpellCraft- easy and fun, by Scott Conningham
Seat of the Soul, by Gary Zukar

Mailing list sugested...
WitchHaven mailing list-@witchHaven.com

Places sugested...
4 Quarters farm- located in MD
Unitarian Univeralist Church- located anywhere
